评论概述: Cheap and Unflattering as Maternity Wear

Maybe an X-Large would have been a better fit for my belly.

评论概述: Some of the descriptions of the dress are not true

I'm 75 years old I don't know that I would look that great in the empire waist. It also says it has Bell sleeves as you can obviously see from the picture it does not have bell sleeves. I am wondering if I return this one and buy another one at the same size with a waist hit me in the right place. Just wondering because the picture is so very wrong.

评论概述: Fit true to size, light weight and great quality.
评论详情: I was searching for an affordable , carefree , boho style dress that would travel well and work for a destination 40th anniversary, Vow renewal . This dress exceeded my expectations. The fit was true to size , I wanted it to be less fitted and flow well so I went with an XL and it was perfect. For reference I’m 5’7 and 180 lbs . The lace is pretty and very nice for the price . The dress is lined but still sheer , I’m a 60 year old woman who’s very modest and knew the sunshine would make the dress more transparent, so I wore a slip with it and it worked out perfectly . We were married in Maine in Aug 1984 and renewed our vows in Maine, in Aug 40 years later .

This lace dress was the perfect balance of detail and simplicity. I purchased a medium, in my last trimester and it was still comfy enough with room to spare. Could be use for maternity, bridal, family photos, etc.
If you have a larger chest, size up! The chest is a bit tight compared to the rest of the dress.

It still would not zip up past my chest area and there is NO stretch to it. I am a 40 F cup size, and typically wear a large or Xl in dresses. Everywhere else seemed to fit fine but my chest was exploding out the top and not in a cute way. And like it said it wouldn’t even zip once it got up to that area. Very cute and looks as advertised, just be aware for bigger chested girls. Well I'm not sure if it was amazon or the mfg but kept getting the wrong lace design but the right color (white).I wanted white04 but was sent the completely wrong dress the 1st time, the design with short sleeves when I ordered the off the shoulder dress. The 2nd time they sent the right dress but wrong lace pattern.  I'm 5'0, 135. I ordered a small the 1st time and got the wrong dress. The zip is terrible.  You can't even zip the dress up when not on your body and difficult off your body. Plus it looked too small.  So... I ordered a medium,  off shoulder dress. I have about 2-3" on both hip, so it's big, but bc of the style,  could make it work. I then ordered a small,  off shoulder dress, it fit great, but was way too long and again the wrong lace pattern.The dress is great if you can figure out your size and you don't get the style with the zip.I will try again bc it's for my wedding!  I think it's true to size! Crossed fingers I get the right dress.P.s. If they send the wrong dress they will not send the correct one until you send the wrong dress back!!!!So, if time is an issue,  you have to buy another dress and wait for your refund!!!Good luck

I LOVE THIS DRESS!!!!!!  I just turned 60 and had a “senior Prom” birthday part.  I wanted a dress similar to what I would have worn in the late 70’s if I had gone to prom.  This dress was perfect.  I am 5’4 and I weigh 213.0 and purchased the xxl, it fit great!!  The dress was very long on me but it didn’t bother me.  The ONLY THING that bothered me was the lace and elastic around the top was very itchy for me.  I do have sensitive skin so others may not have an issue with that.  The elastic worked very well and the top stayed in place with zero slippage.  I felt beautiful and received tons of compliments.
I absolutely loved this dress. It was a little too lowcut for me but I loved everything about this dress and got a ton of compliments.

I thought this dress was super pretty and the quality seemed great as well. I even loved the true orange color that differed from the muted copper pictured in the description. When I tried it on I was very disappointed. The dress completely FLATTENED my bust. I’m a 38 DDD….. so I’m used my my boobs being squished in clothes, however this dress was maybe large enough in the bust for a small b cup. I didn’t even wear a bra while trying it on and it squeezed so tight it looked like my boobs were taped down to my chest. I was so sad because it fit the other areas of my body nicely :(
